GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.15.87
GSD.description:
tpm: acpi: Call acpi_put_table() to fix memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.87 by commit 638cd298dfebce46919cbd6cf1884701215f506d, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit 0bfb23746052168620c5b52f49d8a47c3bb022fa. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tpm: acpi: Call acpi_put_table() to fix memory leak
